Class BaseEsrimapSimpleServiceProxy

All Implemented Interfaces:
SimpleServiceProxy
public class BaseEsrimapSimpleServiceProxy
extends BaseSimpleServiceProxy

A client-side proxy implementation for accessing an ArcIMS service via an ESRIMAP HTTP connection.

          The login password string.

Constructor Detail

BaseEsrimapSimpleServiceProxy

public BaseEsrimapSimpleServiceProxy(String service,
                                     Esrimap emap,
                                     boolean useCustomStream)
Create a service proxy object for accessing a named IMS service via HTTP using an ESRIMAP

Parameters:
service - the IMS service name
emap - the Esrimap
useCustomStream - set this to TRUE if custom EsrimapInputStream is to be used (for rigorous error checking/handling), else FALSE
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null

BaseEsrimapSimpleServiceProxy

public BaseEsrimapSimpleServiceProxy(String service,
                                     Esrimap emap)
Create a service proxy object for accessing the given IMS service via HTTP using an ESRIMAP. EsrimapInputStream is used for rigorous error checking/handling.

Parameters:
service - the IMS service name
emap - the Esrimap

BaseEsrimapSimpleServiceProxy

public BaseEsrimapSimpleServiceProxy(Esrimap emap)
Creates a service proxy object for accessing an IMS service via a HTTP connection using an ESRIMAP. EsrimapInputStream is used for rigorous error checking/handling. The admin service is the default service name used as it is always available in Esrimap.

Parameters:
emap - the Esrimap
